00031 class V1731Board :      public V17XXBoard

00033 public:
00034         V1731Board( int board_index, void (* scope_refresh)( int, bool), void (*update_samples_ready_led)( bool), wxMutex *p_data_mutex, AppSettings* p_app_settings, V17XXBoard::BOARD_VARIANT board_variant, bool is_des_mode);
00035 
00036         //
00037         // Pure virtual implementation
00038         wxString GetTypeString() 
00039         { 
00040                 switch( m_board_variant)
00041                 {
00042                 case BV_VME:
00043                         return this->m_is_des_mode? _("V1731_DES"): _("V1731");
00044                 case BV_DESKTOP:
00045                         return this->m_is_des_mode? _("DT5731_DES"): _("DT5731");
00046                 case BV_NIM:
00047                         return this->m_is_des_mode? _("N6731_DES"): _("N6731");
00048                 }
00049                 return this->m_is_des_mode? _("XXX731_DES undef variant"):  _("XXX731 undef variant");
00050         };
00051         CVT_V17XX_TYPES GetType() { return CVT_V1731;}
00052         double GetClockMHz() const { return CVT_V17XX_BOARD_CLOCK_KHZ[ this->m_is_des_mode? CVT_V1731_DES_BOARD_CLOCK_INDEX: CVT_V1731_BOARD_CLOCK_INDEX]*0.001;};
00053         int GetSampleBit() const { return 8;} 
00054         double GetVolt2Bit() const { return ((double)( 1<< 16)) / 1.081;};
00055         bool Init( long vme_handle);
00056         UINT8 GetChEnableMsk() const 
00057         { 
00058                 switch( m_board_variant)
00059                 {
00060                 case BV_VME:
00061                         return this->m_is_des_mode? 0x55: 0xff;
00062                 case BV_DESKTOP:
00063                 case BV_NIM:
00064                         return this->m_is_des_mode? 0x05: 0x0f;
00065                 }
00066                 return 0x00;
00067         }
00068         bool GetBoardMemory( UINT32 &num_ksamples_per_channel);
00069 
00070         //
00071         // Virtuals override
00072         virtual double GetDACUpdateFactor( void){ return 8.0;};
